{{ question.title }}

By {{ question.user.userName }} on {{ question.created }}

{{ question.content }}

{{ question.Replies.length }} {{ question.Replies.length === 1 ? 'reply' : 'replies' }}
import { Component, Input } from "@angular/core" import { IQuestion } from "../questions/question" @Component({ selector: "app-question-overview-card-component", templateUrl: "./questionOverviewCard.component.html", }) export class QuestionOverviewCardComponent { @Input() question!: IQuestion; }
